post.text: Thank you! I love you too! -DJT

comment.author: Andrew
comment.text: I'm so excited for the debates, Mr. Trump! It's going to be your time to secure the support from all the undecided voters and your time to embarrass Clinton on stage with millions of viewers. Good luck and God bless!! #Trump2016 #MakeAmericaGreatAgain

replies.author: Elisha
replies.text: I couldn't agree more - Go Trump!

replies.author: Chase
replies.text: Are you stupid Jim? Don't answer!
